entry.string: Administration - xarCPShop
What is it?
xarCPShop integrates one or more Cafe Press Shops into your Xaraya site.
It is based on code from a similar module for Postnuke by Ed Grosvener at http://www.thecpschool.com, rewritten and updated to work with current Cafe Press Site and Xaraya. The module enables you to:
Add one or more Cafe Press Shops .
Grab the product pages from your Cafe Press Shops and displays them within Xaraya.
Have your users browse your products and product details while remaining on your Xaraya site.
How to use it?

This module is still in early develoment but the basics are quite functional. The module does a simple integration of your Cafe Press Shop by capturing the Cafe Press URL and presenting that information in a page on your Xaraya site. To use the module:
Install and activate in the usual way through the module List View page
In xarCPShop Administration, click on Add Shop
Add a description for your shop, the actual Cafe Press Shop ID, and the top level of the shop if it is part of a Premium Shop. This latter field can be left blank
Set any additional configuration variables in the Modify Config screen.
Included Blocks
Featured Product Block - Choose a single product from a specified store to feature. It is also best to cache this block which prevents errors should the Cafe Press web site be down.
Random Product Block - Choose to display X number of products from a selected store in a random display block on your page.
Included Hooks
No hooks are included
